title: Web Connection Protocol Hello
description: Hello message sent by an application to a parent window or frame when attempting to establish connectivity to a Desktop Agent

fdc3Version.title: FDC3 version
fdc3Version.description: The version of FDC3 API that the app supports.

resolver.title: Intent Resolver Required
resolver.description: A flag that may be used to indicate that an intent resolver is or is not required. Set to false if no intents, or only targeted intents, are raised

channelSelector.title: Channel Selector Required
channelSelector.description: A flag that may be used to indicate that a channel selector UI is or is not required. If the app includes its own UI for displaying
